name: Helper - Export 1099 Vendors List to CSV
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

block.name: search_object_v2
block.title: Search Vendors

input.field_list:
taxIdNum
isInactive
is1099Eligible
internalId
accountNumber
entityId
address1
billCity
billState
billZipCode

block.comment: just get the number of pages

input.field_list:

extended_input_schema.name: lines
extended_input_schema.label: CSV data lines
extended_input_schema.hint: Provide field mappings for the CSV data below.

block.name: send_mail

input.subject: List of 1099 Vendors
input.body: Here is the list of 1099 Vendors from NetSuite.

block.comment: The email address should be of the person who runs the report. After receiving the report over mail, it should be forwarded to concerned person for review.
